attributes.action: Get community support groups running in Wales
attributes.additional_details:
It can cost vertically nothing to run these support groups as we can get volunteers to help run them and get community places for free or at low cost 
Weekly meetings can help someone so much and I want to make a difference to people's lives
attributes.background:
I want to get community support groups running in Wales, support groups for people to come and talk to others who understands what they are going though. 
I want to get support groups for 
Bullying 
Violence 
Mental health 
Addiction 
Sexuality 
Homeless

rejection.details:
The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. You may be able to start a petition to the Welsh Assembly about this. 

You can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
